casebody.data:
Sandra MERRITT, Movant/Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. No. ED 105790 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION FOUR. FILED: April 24, 2018
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied May 30, 2018.
Application for Transfer to Supreme Court Denied August 21, 2018 FOR APPELLANT: Gwenda R. Robinson, 1010 Market Street, Suite 1100, St. Louis, Missouri 63101. FOR RESPONDENT: Dora A. Fichter, P.O. Box 899, Jefferson City, Missouri 65102. Before Colleen Dolan, P.J., Mary K. Hoff, J., and Lisa S. Van Amburg, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Sandra Merritt appeals from the judgment of the circuit court denying her Rule 29.035 motion for post-conviction relief without an evidentiary hearing. Finding no error, we affirm.

We have reviewed the briefs of the parties and the record on appeal and find no error of law. No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. However, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum opinion for their information only, setting forth the facts and reasons for this order.

The judgment of the trial court is affirmed in accordance with Rule 84.16(b).
